member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.MainWindow.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises the Window, making the hosted IDE-Content-Pane point back to this MainWindow

member.summary: Passthrough for Alt + F4 or the [x] button

member.name: F:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.ParentWPFWindow
member.summary: A possibly-Nothing pointer the MainWindow that this current IDEWindowContent is being hosted in. This is not taken-in as a Constructor Argument, because WPF components seem to need zero-parameter Constructors, in order to be usable in XAML.

member.name: P:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.CurrentExecutionContext
member.summary: Initialised in the Constructor, because with an inline initialisation, ExeCxt.GUIDefault attempt to Log a message, and can't (because the CurrentLogEventHandler isn't yet initialised).

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises the IDE-Content-Pane. DON'T FORGET TO ASSIGN TO [ParentWPFWindow] IF POSSIBLE.

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.ConfigureInstance_FromCLAs_
member.summary: WPF substitute for a "Me.Shown" Handler...

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.HandleShortcutKey_(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: The centralised mapping of Shortcut-Keys to Handlers-thereof

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.StartBackgroundWorker(System.String,System.Action)
member.summary: Starts the Task, then Returns. When finished, the UI is reset to the Idle state. Exceptions hence ↓ are MsgBoxed out
member.param: A present-progressive-tense verb, e.g. "Compiling". Appears in the Status Strip
This MUST NOT Access UI Components without Me.InvokeIfRequired()

member.name: P:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.CurrentSource_IsSaved
member.summary: Automatically adjusts the Window Title

member.name: F:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.OnClosingAction_Passthrough
member.summary: Enables pressing Alt + F4 on the ParentWPFWindow to display a do-you-want-to-save-before-closing MsgBox.

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.RunCurrentSource
member.summary: Calls the ParseCurrentSource(), LexCachedTokens(), and ExecuteCachedProgram() Methods

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.ParseCurrentSource
member.summary: Sets the Me.Cached_Tokens Member, and Applies SyntaxHighlighting

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.LexCachedTokens
member.summary: Sets the Me.Cached_Program Member

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.ExecuteCachedProgram
member.summary: Sets the Me.Cached_ProgramExeRes Member

member.name: M:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.UpdateInterpretationButtonsState_(DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent.InterpretationStage_)
member.summary: Enables the buttons up-to-and-including _FurthestDownInterpretationButtonToBeEnabled, and sets all buttons BEFORE _FurthestDownInterpretationButtonToBeEnabled to the GREEN Gradient Background Colour. Handles the Program Analysis Buttons corrosponding too. DOES NOT Manage which Interpretation-Cache-Objects should be set to [Nothing]. (This functionality was removed as it was causing major bugs.)

member.name: T:DocScript.WindowsIDE.IDEWindowContent
member.summary: The actual DSIDE controls (Ribbon, TextEditor, etc), hosted in MainWindow, and also used in the DS-File-Explorer-Preview-Handler
member.remarks: The Properties and Feilds are not declared at the top of this Class File. Rather, they are close to where they are used, inside [#Region]s.
